website_summaries.verdict: If you're going for a natural look but still want volume, this pair strikes a nice balance, making them ideal for everyday use.
pros: Lightweight and holds up well between uses
Made from 100% sterilized human hair and features a crisscross feathering effect
Dramatic yet not over the top

customer_reviews.title: Finally found my lash!
customer_reviews.text: These are the lashes I've been searching for! They are perfect length and curl. Nothing crazy, but it gives your eye that bit of glamour that we all love. I tried almost every line from ardell and these are more natural than the Demi wispies, which for me were a tad bit too long. I will order these again, can't beat the price for 4 pairs of lashes.
customer_reviews.author: GiannaBella

customer_reviews.title: Perfect natural look
customer_reviews.text: These are great for a more subtle look. It’s wonderful fullness to your natural eye lashes. I wear these everyday.
customer_reviews.author: Jennah

customer_reviews.title: Bold natural look
customer_reviews.text: Natural looking.....got lots of compliments....fits in well with any occasion. If you want to highlight your eyes and still not look too much like you have on false lashes, then this is definitely the right choice for you. Not too thick and overbearing, just right.
customer_reviews.author: Soph300

customer_reviews.title: Amazing & Natural
customer_reviews.text: I love Ardell products. These are amazing! They look amazing on and I've gotten tons of compliments. They look really natural and I'm actually thinking about ordering another set. Just wish I could find the best eyelash glue! Was trying to add a picture but couldn't figure it out....
customer_reviews.author: Reese Dianato

customer_reviews.title: These Are Great Lashes, but...
customer_reviews.text: I love these lashes, great shape, perfect length. This is a great option if you need them quickly with free shipping. However, if you live near an Ulta, you can get these in a pack of 5 pairs for $11.99 with free in-store pick-up. Get your money's worth! These ones are going back to Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Abby Brenner

customer_reviews.title: My Dancer's Favorite Eyelashes!
customer_reviews.text: These eyelashes are perfect for my daughters dance competitions. They look more natural than any others we have tried. Wish they came with glue, but I can deal with it.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Bodnar

customer_reviews.title: Love It and Will Recommend
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually leave reviews on the products I buy but I feel like these deserve it, these lashes are some of the best lashes I've ever used. They're light and the strip is small enough that you won't be able to tell that it's there without eyeliner. I would recommend these to anyone that looking for a fun yet natural look. They also came earlier then expected and wasn't damaged in the package. And yes, I know, the quality of the photo is bad. Don't come at me lol
customer_reviews.author: Shay N

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: These are great lashes, easy to put on and not heavy since I’ve fallen asleep with these on and woken up with them still on and could just continue to wear them. They are a little less natural looking but they are that little bit of glam especially nowadays where everyone is wearing a mask and all you see are your eyes.
customer_reviews.author: geezabrat

customer_reviews.title: Wear them everyday look natural
customer_reviews.text: I wear these everyday and get compliments regularly on how beautiful my lashes are and asked if they are real because they look real and not fake at all.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: The natural look and feel.
customer_reviews.text: The look like real eye lashes .Easy to put on and I even cut to make shorter and they held together. Fell good on.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price!!
customer_reviews.text: Great price better the Sally or Target store. I will be buying more here !! I received my lashes super fast!! Goo quality!!
customer_reviews.author: Alexa13

customer_reviews.title: Love them
customer_reviews.text: I knew the size I wanted before I got these. They fit great I will definitely order from amazon
customer_reviews.author: Caren M. Muse

customer_reviews.title: Light and Natural
customer_reviews.text: These are my go to lashes. Not too dramatic and very light weight. I usually reuse them one time before I switch
customer_reviews.author: Shopaholic

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: These have always been my favorite go to lashes for any occasion Ardell 102 and Ardell 106 These are 106
customer_reviews.author: Arii

customer_reviews.title: Mom is very happy with her gift
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my Mom and she loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: The best fake lashes
customer_reviews.text: All time favorite fake lashes of all time! The best!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Smith

customer_reviews.title: Ardells best lashes ever!
customer_reviews.text: I've been using these lashes for years. I've always liked ardell lashes but these ones are the best! and they've been discontinued in all the stores around me so to see that they're available for sale is awesome thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Jody Turner

customer_reviews.title: Very good product
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my grand daughter and she loves them. They are the only kind she will wear now. The eye lashes arrived quickly and not damaged. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NATURAL LOOKING
customer_reviews.text: I was glad to have found these on the Amazon site, I searched a few stores with no luck. I love these lashes they are so natural looking & at a great price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Anna Marie Gonzales

customer_reviews.title: Nice Lashes
customer_reviews.text: very nice lashes. I am happy with this product. Natural looking.
customer_reviews.author: Ciara Branch

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Cat Eye Lashes
customer_reviews.text: Everything came packaged nicely! These are my favorite lashes so I’m glad that it came with 4 pairs :)
customer_reviews.author: Krystle Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: My favorite lashes! Great for cosplay or just fun makeup looks totally worth it!

customer_reviews.title: My favorite eyelashes
customer_reviews.text: Love this eyelashes, they are very natural looking and can wear them everyday.
customer_reviews.author: L&DGBAY

customer_reviews.title: VERY NATURAL LOOKING
customer_reviews.text: Fits nicely since little makeup is being worn while wearing a mask.
customer_reviews.author: Evelyn W.

customer_reviews.title: Very easy and natural looking
customer_reviews.text: I love these lashes. They look so natural and they are so light and easy to put on.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Mc Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Lashes nice but
customer_reviews.text: Lashes look great but there was some weird greasy substance on the packaging. I had to wash the containers.
customer_reviews.author: iliana tineo

customer_reviews.title: Paid for two got one
customer_reviews.text: I ordered 2 I got one and I paid for two🙁
customer_reviews.author: dwain norred

customer_reviews.title: Too thin
customer_reviews.text: These lashes don't really even do anything for my eyes. They are too thin in between each lash.. I was skeptical about that and I was right. I will use them up for work but will not reorder. I was looking for a lash less obvious but these really not nonexistent.
customer_reviews.author: Ferf

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Love the brand my eyes a very sensitive so this brand work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: These Ariel lashes are grey best, I’ve tried so many and these are the top of the list I will definitely order them again
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Israel

customer_reviews.text: I have always loved these lashes. Great quality and price
customer_reviews.author: Katie

customer_reviews.title: Ardell Natural Lashes
customer_reviews.text: I have been wearing ARDELL Lashes for many year and a pair can last me almost a month...

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I will take a photo another time but they are quite attractive There should be an option on whether you want to buy 4 pairs 3 pairs or 2 pairs
customer_reviews.author: shania

product_meta.title: Ardell Natural Lashes False Eyelashes 120 Black (4 pack)
feature_bullets: EVERYDAY GLAM WITH A NATURAL LOOK: Ardell Natural Lashes 120 Black falsies look so real and natural that others think you were born with beautiful, lush eyelashes! Made of 100% human hair, knotted lash strip and feathered by hand to achieve the highest quality falsies that offer lightweight volume and top off different makeup styles. Permanently curled, waterproof, reusable, comfortable to wear and easy to apply. Definitely, the go-to lashes to emphasize your naturally gorgeous eyes every day!

LIGHTWEIGHT, CRISSCROSSED, FLARED LASH STYLE: These natural-looking lashes have criss-cross layering feathery effect - shorter on the inner corner and longer on the outer corner for the forever-glam winged out effect on your natural eyelashes. Super lightweight with a flared lash style that many will find irresistible! Perfect for every false eyelash lover who wants falsies that looks so natural but doesn’t want anything complicated.

100% PREMIUM-GRADE HUMAN HAIR: Ardell Natural Lashes 120 Black is made from 100% sterilized human hair and has super soft, fine fibers specially designed to provide the perfect amount of fullness and length on your natural eyelashes without being too overpowering. Naturally bold yet not too dramatic lashes for your everyday use. Also, all of Ardell faux lashes are 100% cruelty-free so you can use them without worrying about animals being harmed for your falsies!

INVISIBAND FOR A COMFORTABLE WEAR: These false lashes improve your look without being heavy on the eyes! Invisiband provides an undetectable lash band and the most comfortable wear that disappears and blends with your natural lashes. Wear on special occasions or on a regular day and have that glam, effortless look! Be assured that your falsies will stay on all day, all night.

REUSABLE, EASY APPLICATION: Fit to size, cut accordingly, and glue away! These falsies are the perfect blinkers to pair your eyes with! Totally reusable and will last for multiple application when stored properly. To remove, gently peel off lash strip, remove glue from the band, clean delicately and place lashes back on tray for reuse. You can always have an easy and uncomplicated application that speaks natural volume on your eyelashes with these beauties from Ardell!
